name: Evelynn
title: Agony's Embrace

P.name: Demon Shade

effects.description: Innate: Evelynn gains Demon Shade after not performing actions that break stealth for 4 seconds. Taking damage from enemy champions or turrets ends Demon Shade immediately and puts it on a 1.5-second static cooldown.
Demon Shade: While below 250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health, Evelynn heals herself for 15 − 75 (based on level) every second. From level 6 onward, Demon Shade also grants camouflage.

P.notes:
Demon Shade is also placed on a 1.5 second cooldown upon respawning.
Demon Shade activates even if Evelynn is  Recalling.
Whenever Demon Shade activates, a puff of purple smoke will briefly appear around her.
     Evelynn being  revealed in Demon Shade (post 6).
P.blurb: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

Q.name: Hate Spike

effects.description: Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.
Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or abilities against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.
Hate Spike may be recast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.

Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Hate Spike will first prioritize Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest enemy champion.
A nearby enemy is required to recast this ability.

Q.notes:
Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade and stacking  Force Pulse.
Hate Spike prioritizes:
The last champion Evelynn hit
The last non-champion Evelynn hit
The lowest-health champion
The lowest-health non-champion
The dart applies  spell damage and the spikes deal  area damage.
Hate Spike will fire from wherever Evelynn was at the start of the cast time.
Recasts can be buffered up to 0.5 seconds before becoming castable.
Q.blurb: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.

W.name: Allure

effects.description: Active: Evelynn curses the target enemy champion or monster for 5 seconds.
Evelynn's next basic attack or ability against the accursed target expunges them, slowing them by 65% for 0.75 seconds.

Expunging a target will refund Allure's mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
Against champions, the expunge also reduces their magic resistance for 4 seconds.Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the charm lasts 2 seconds longer.
Casting Allure does not break Demon Shade nor its fade into it.

W.notes:
The mark fully forming signifies the 2.5 seconds have elapsed, meaning the  charm will be applied on the triggering attack or ability.
An enemy champion cursed by Allure is alarmed of her presence and after the mark has fully formed, an arrow will appear next to them pointing towards Evelynn's direction. This is visible to both teams.
The  magic penetration will be applied to the attack or ability that triggers it.
Allure's mark application on a target cannot be blocked by  spell shield.
The expunge will not occur if the ability is blocked by a spell shield. The mark does not trigger and will remain on the target in this case.
W.blurb: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.

E.name: Whiplash

effects.description: Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing them magic damage and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

units: % (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

effects.description: Evelynn also gains 30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Gaining Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and empowers its next cast.

E.notes: Whiplash can be  dodged and  blocked but may not miss if Evelynn is  blinded.
E.blurb: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.

E.name: Empowered Whiplash

effects.description: Active: Evelynn dashes toward the target enemy, dealing increased damage to them as well as all enemies within her path. On-hit effects are only applied to the primary target.

units: % (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health
% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health

effects.description: The percentile health damage deals a minimum of 25 and is capped at 450 against monsters.

E.notes:
Evelynn will follow her target if they change locations such as  blinking or  dashing during Empowered Whiplash.
There is no time-out period on Empowered Whiplash.
Empowered Whiplash can be  blocked but cannot be  dodged and/or missed if Evelynn is  blinded.

R.name: Last Caress

effects.description: Active: Evelynn becomes untargetable as she reveals her true form to all enemies in front of her in the target direction, before blinking 700 units in the opposite direction and becoming targetable again.
Enemies caught in her reveal are devastated, taking magic damage, with enemies below 30% of their maximum health receiving 140% bonus damage.

R.notes:
Last Caress can be buffered during  Empowered Whiplash.
The casting input controls the direction Last Caress'  damage is dealt from, with the movement automatically happening in the reverse direction.
Enemy  champions below the maximum health threshold are marked for Evelynn, indicating the bonus damage opportunity.
The screen will direct to Evelynn's position after she  blinks.
R.blurb: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.

lore: Within the dark seams of Runeterra, the demon Evelynn searches for her next victim. She lures in prey with the voluptuous façade of a human female, but once a person succumbs to her charms, Evelynn's true form is unleashed. She then subjects her victim to unspeakable torment, gratifying herself with their pain. To the demon, these liaisons are innocent flings. To the rest of Runeterra, they are ghoulish tales of lust gone awry and horrific reminders of the cost of wanton desire.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: Within the dark seams of Runeterra, the demon Evelynn searches for her next victim. She lures in prey with the voluptuous façade of a human female, but once a person succumbs to her charms, Evelynn’s true form is unleashed. She then subjects her victim to unspeakable torment, gratifying herself with their pain. To the demon, these liaisons are innocent flings. To the rest of Runeterra, they are ghoulish tales of lust gone awry and horrific reminders of the cost of wanton desire.

skins.name: Blood Moon
skins.lore: A seductive demon summoned on the night of the Blood Moon, Evelynn moves between isolated villages, wooing the residents until they fall deeply in love with her. One by one these poor souls will surely perish, their hearts torn from their still-living bodies.

skins.name: KDA
skins.lore: No one is as deliciously volatile as Evelynn. She's a diva who drives divisiveness in the media—they love her one day and hate her the next, her name a permanent fixture of tabloid headlines. She is a born superstar, and the foundation of K/DA's sound.

skins.name: Prestige KDA
skins.lore: With that wild in her veins, K/DA Evelynn stomps into the spotlight, shimmering in a custom golden outfit from the Pop Music Awards. Only 'winning, winning' now.

skins.name: Sugar Rush

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.lore: In a world where every tooth is sweet, Evelynn's sugary bite is deadly.

skins.name: KDA ALL OUT

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: With a single devastating glance, Evelynn can ensure that all eyes are on her—when she wants them to be. K/DA's success has ensured that this provocative diva's name will be on everyone's lips, but Evelynn is intent that her killer fashion sense will keep it there.
